properties.title: Concierge OSGi - An optimized OSGi R3 implementation for mobile and embedded systems - Concierge on iPAQ Linux Familiar
properties.author: Jan S. Rellermeyer

meta.name: description
meta.content: Concierge is an optimized OSGi R3 implementation with a minimal file and memory footprint, which makes it ideal for small and embedded devices.

section.name: Concierge on iPAQ Linux Familiar
section.p:
Concierge has been tested with the 0.8.x releases of familiar linux. Concierge runs with Blackdown 1.3.1 RC1, SableVM 1.11 (from familiar 0.8) and JamVM (from familiar > 0.8.2).
SableVM has a known problem with double and float values, most likely due to a broken version of libffi. And SableVM does not support the -jar option (due to incompatibility with busybox), instead, -cp has to be used.
